text: The 2003 Eastern District Council election was held on 23 November 2003 to elect all 36 elected members to the 45-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:27.8%;" | 10 | style="background:grey; width:2.70%;" | 1 | style="background:red; width:72.2%;" | 26 |- | Pro-democracy | I. | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:32.4%;" | 12 | style="background:grey; width:2.70%;" | 1 | style="background:red; width:64.9%;" | 24 |- | Pro-democracy | I. | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== Category:2003 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2003 Eastern District Council election
